survey_brief: This survey aims to gather insights on patient experiences, preferences, and satisfaction levels with telemedicine services to improve future offerings.

questions.question_text: How often have you used telemedicine services in the past 12 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity.

script.question_text: How often have you used telemedicine services in the past 12 months?

questions.question_text: What types of medical consultations have you used telemedicine for? (Select all that apply)
answer_options: Urgent care (e.g., cold, flu, minor injuries)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times' or more in Q1
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE). Include an 'Other' option with open-text follow-up.
